name: CubeSlide (renatopardo)
description:
Press the A & D buttons to move from side to side while dodging the obstacles that spawn in front of you.

This is my first game, hopefully you enjoy it and please feel free to leave your comments below.

Disclaimer: This is not an original idea, most content belongs to Brackeys, please go check him out at: https://www.youtube.com/user/Brackeys
